PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07572019-06-09,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC,  HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING A TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to enable the Government to propose risk management measures for toxic substance under CEPA to manage environmental risks associated with 1,4-benzenediamine, N,N'-mixed phenyl and tolyl derivatives (i.e. BENPAT).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0198 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
